_sText:
****UPDATED****
Added more detail(dust, some small objects, wall materials)
Moved the Van a little so now people can enter it.
Also fixed a bug where the walls turned black.
-------------------------------
When i first started playing css i played aim_noob as my first map online and since i enjoyed playing it with other players i often tried to search for it, but there arent any servers playing that map so i decided to make a remake of it. And decided to call it aim_buddha. SInce its based on aim_noob and i have no idea who the author of it was/is i can only writte unknown. Thanks to whoever you are for my first experience with css. 
-------------------------------------------------------------
Aim_buddha is a fast action map two flanks for each side and also a stair on both sides to go up on the walls. It has a open arena with cover walls on both sides and is kept in the popular de_dust styled geometry. 
Can be used for Normal Gameplay / Team-Deathmatch(maybe not too good) / GunGame 
Would be very happy to see my first map getting played on just one server.
------------------------------
INSTALL
------------------------------
Place the bsp and nav file in cstrike/maps
---------------------------------------------------
Diffrences from the original and to the remake:
Map has info_nodes for bots
Map has cubemaps
Map has light
Map has now also has Fog
Map is open
Map has a little more detail and a little more walkable areas
----------------------------------------------------------------------
The Map has 9 spawns for both teams so the map doesnt get crowded too much
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Since this is my first release of css maps dont be too hard :)
----------------------------------------------------------------------
